title: [Documentation Clarification] nn.Upsample
body_html:
In documentation of nn.Upsample, for the parameter scale_factor if we have a 5D Tensor as input what should be the order of list provided as scale_factor?
That is do the elements of scale_factor correspond to [depth, height, width] or [height, width, depth] as order is not clearly mentioned in documentation in random order.

Also as in all other Layers MaxPool3D, Conv3D we use the former i.e. [depth, height, width] so for generality if scale_factor corresponds to latter then it should be maybe changed to former order (just my opinion)?

If it's the former case we should update documentation otherwise maybe we should change the the parameter order.
body_text:
In documentation of nn.Upsample, for the parameter scale_factor if we have a 5D Tensor as input what should be the order of list provided as scale_factor?
That is do the elements of scale_factor correspond to [depth, height, width] or [height, width, depth] as order is not clearly mentioned in documentation in random order.
Also as in all other Layers MaxPool3D, Conv3D we use the former i.e.  [depth, height, width] so for generality if scale_factor corresponds to latter then it should be maybe changed to former order (just my opinion)?
If it's the former case we should update documentation otherwise maybe we should change the the parameter order.
body:
In documentation of [nn.Upsample](https://pytorch.org/docs/master/nn.html#torch.nn.Upsample), for the parameter `scale_factor` if we have a 5D Tensor as input what should be the order of list provided as `scale_factor`?
That is do the elements of `scale_factor` correspond to [`depth`, `height`, `width`] or [`height`, `width`, `depth`] as order is not clearly mentioned in documentation in random order.

Also as in all other Layers MaxPool3D, Conv3D we use the former i.e.  [`depth`, `height`, `width`] so for generality if scale_factor corresponds to latter then it should be maybe changed to former order (just my opinion)?

If it's the former case we should update documentation otherwise maybe we should change the the parameter order.
